item.title: Fireside Chat with Carl Meyer
item.description:
Description

"Fireside Chat" with: Carl Meyer and Calvin Hendryx-Parker

Join Carl Meyer of Instagram for a Fireside Chat on their infrastructure, best practices, and more!

Recorded at the 2020 Python Web Conference (https://2020.pythonwebconf.com)
